sentences.sContent: Romantic artists portrayed nature as wild and powerful.
sentences.sCn: 浪漫主义艺术家描绘的大自然是狂野而强大的。

sentences.sContent: The President likes to portray himself as a friend of working people.
sentences.sCn: 总统喜欢以工薪阶层的朋友自居。

remMethod.val: por(看作pour， 倒)+tray(碟)→将颜料倒在碟子上→描绘

words.tran: 记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tranCn: 描写， 描绘；扮演， 饰演
trans.tranOther: to describe or show someone or something in a particular way, according to your opinion of them
